Subskills.name: Multitude
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of drones summoned.

Subskills.name: Rapidfire
Subskills.description: Increases the rate of fire for drones.

Subskills.name: Circuit Breaker
Subskills.description: Drones now fire chain lightning dealing their damage as lightning and inflicting lightning break.

Subskills.name: Explosive Toolkit
Subskills.description: Chance on hit for projectile to explode on impact dealing additional area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Heat Unit
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by drones.

Subskills.name: Detection
Subskills.description: Increases attack range of gunner drones.

Subskills.name: Burning Shot
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to inflict burning.

Subskills.name: Nanodrones
Subskills.description: Drone amount significantly increased. Your drones are super tiny and form two circles around you. Their attacks no longer chain but deal damage in a small area around the target.

Subskills.name: Burst Engine
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to shoot additional projectiles in sequence.

Subskills.name: Immolating Impact
Subskills.description: Unleash a small fire nova when hitting a burning target.

Subskills.name: Splitting Shot
Subskills.description: Gunner drones now fires multiple projectiles in an arc.

Subskills.name: C.Y.C.L.O.P.S.
Subskills.description: Drones now fire a constant laser beam that sticks onto monsters dealing arcane damage four times a second until they die.

Subskills.name: M.E.C.H.A.
Subskills.description: Now only spawn a single drone scaling its damage based on the amount of drones and shooting at an increased rate of fire.
